entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of drizzle or light snow. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom near midnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
